actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey to Oklahoma State University the mineral rights held by the United States in certain lands in Oklahoma.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey all mineral interests reserved to the United States in specified land to Oklahoma State University.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey to Oklahoma State University the mineral rights held by the United States in certain lands in Oklahoma.
